snippet.title: Squingle | Launch Trailer | Meta Quest
snippet.description:
Squingle is out now on Meta Quest: https://www.meta.com/experiences/squingle/9288954704465499/

Squingle is the ultimate Mixed Reality 3D puzzle game. Navigate glass-like mazes called ‘Squingles,’ guiding orbs while avoiding edges and collecting points. Discover why it’s a critically acclaimed 5-star masterpiece!

10/10 - “The perfect VR game.” ~ Zimtok5
93% - “A masterpiece.” ~ RuffTalkVR
91% - “One of a kind.” ~ VRGameCritic
“Brilliantly creative” ~ RoadToVR

✨ 100 LEVELS AND MORE TO COME
Launching with 100 levels, with more added over time. Levels grow complex, featuring tighter spaces and new challenges.

🌈 A VISUAL MASTERPIECE
Each maze is a stunning, morphing sculpture, offering an unmatched visual experience in Mixed Reality or immersive modes.

🧩 ACCESSIBILITY
Designed to be accessible for a wide range of skill levels, with intuitive controls and hand-tracking support for seamless play, whether standing or seated.

😌 RELAX & UNWIND
Play on the sofa or in room-sized mazes. Squingle’s calming gameplay will soothe your soul.

FEATURES
Level Add-ons: New puzzles soon.
Mixed Reality: Augmented or immersive modes.
Challenge Mode: Time trials and global leaderboards.
Hand Tracking support.
Room/Mini scale: Play big or small!
Race your ghost: Beat your best times.


🏅 AWARDS
Best VR Game ~ GDWC Finalist Finalist ~ QLDXR Festival “Best of the Quest” ~ Gibby’s Guide
💖 Experience SQUINGLE’s almost perfect 5-star rating on the Quest Store. Get ready to be Squingled!

https://www.meta.com/experiences/squingle/9288954704465499/

#Squingle #MixedReality #MetaQuest
